metadata.title: CVE-2022-1998 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A use after free in the Linux kernel File System notify functionality wasfound in the way user triggers copy_info_records_to_user() call to fail incopy_event_to_user(). A local user could use this flaw to crash the systemor potentially escalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
